title: ASTRONAUTICS
description:
Cat. I 
An introductory course that covers the fundamentals of space flight, spacecraft trajectory analysis and mission design. Topics studied: orbital mechanics; geocentric orbits and trajectories; interplanetary transfers; ambient space environments for geocentric orbits and interplanetary transfers; introduction to spacecraft and mission design. 

Recommended background: dynamics (ES 2503, PH 2201 or equivalent).
